title: Drawing, Design for Sideboard with Serpentine Front and Three Drawers, 1900–05
title_raw: Design for Sideboard with Serpentine Front and Three Drawers
medium: Graphite and pen and red ink on thin cream paper
inscribed: Inscribed in pen and red ink, center below image: Mahogany [inverted "V"][box with dot center][inverted "U"]; upper left and lower left of image with arrow pointing to design: inlaid; center left and upper center of image, numerical notations indicating dimensions.
creditline: Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society
description: Oblong sideboard with 6 straight tapering legs; tri-partite serpentine front has 3 drawers arranged in 2 rows at center, flanked by 2 doors.

participants.person_name: The Lake St. Louis Historical Society

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Design for Sideboard with Serpentine Front and Three Drawers, 1900–05. Graphite and pen and red ink on thin cream paper. 
Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society. 2000-69-44.
